channel.title: Comments on: Perplexed in Monument Valley
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: mrenlow
item.dc:creator: mrenlow
item.description: Incredible game. Also, the design is simple enough that even my four-year-old daughter can meet with a fair amount of success (with prompts from Dad).
item.content:encoded: Incredible game. Also, the design is simple enough that even my four-year-old daughter can meet with a fair amount of success (with prompts from Dad).
